content: this round you have already purled together one double st you have one more double st to purl together in the next round the first one was purled together through the back loop purl this one normally together need more help → https //youtu be/klzickul0he -5- you have 24 sts again on the sole part and 24 sts for the instep keep working in the round till you reach the desired length you should start decreasing just above your pinkie toe decrease 4 sts in each decreasing round the pattern is always the same first st k1 then ssk left leaning decrease knit across until 3 sts before the end of this side k2 tg right leaning decrease k1 this is what you repeat on the other side too the toe consist of 14 rounds as follows round 1 k1 ssk k18 sts k2tg k1 the sole is knitted the same way round 2 knit without decreasing round 3 knit without decreasing round 4 k1 ssk k16 sts k2tg k1 the sole is knitted the same way round 5 knit without decreasing round 6 knit without decreasing round 7 k1 ssk k14 sts k2tg k1 the sole is knitted the same way round 8 knit without decreasing round 9 k1 ssk k12 sts k2tg k1 the sole is knitted the same way round 10 k1 ssk k10 sts k2tg k1 the sole is knitted the same way round 11 k1 ssk k8 sts k2tg k1 the sole is knitted the same way round 12 k1 ssk k6 sts k2tg k1 the sole is knitted the same way round 13 k1 ssk k4 sts k2tg k1 the sole is knitted the same way round 14 k1 ssk k2 sts k2tg k1 the sole is knitted the same way you should have 12 stitches left on the four needles transfer your stitches onto two double pointed needles 6-6 sts graft the toe with kitchener stitch video → https //youtu be/ffj8et-tr74 congratulations your sock is done this pattern is copyright © 2025 by sockisticated all rights reserved -6-
